fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Each night, the Investigative Journalist can choose a player to investigate.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- The Investigative Journalist will receive a report on the player's activity and role, similar to the Sheriff and Investigator roles.
- However, the Investigative Journalist's report will also reveal any messages the player has sent or received, including whispers and Mafia chat.
- The Investigative Journalist can only investigate players who have not been investigated before.
- The Investigative Journalist is a skilled investigator and writer, with a nose for the truth.
- The Investigative Journalist is a member of the town and works to uncover the Mafia's plot.
- The Investigative Journalist's role is public knowledge and they can be voted up to the stand and lynched like any other town member.
- Made by AI.
